overview:
What do you do? I am the CEO and am responsible for the overall direction of Autoquake.com, expanding its operations across the UK and continuing to drive sales through our online marketplace.

Why work for Autoquake.com? I’m delighted to have joined the Autoquake.com team. I’ve been a close watcher of the company since its early conception and I’m deeply excited to be bringing my automotive industry experience, skills and insight to such a revolutionary business. I believe together we have what it takes to drive the business forward on full throttle, as the company transforms the car buying experience for consumers and the automotive industry as a whole.

What did you do before? I have worked for over 25 years at the leading edge of the automotive industry in senior management positions at a some of the biggest names in the industry, including Masterlease, Carland, Pendragon, Ford and Lex vehicle Leasing to name but a few. My experience with fleets will enable me help the team to really boost the supply chain of quality ex-fleet vehicles for remarketing on Autoquake.com’s website and promoting the company ethos that the buying and selling of cars online should be as safe, easy convenient and fair as any other purchase we make in our daily lives.

What do you drive? I drive an Audi TT and just love driving it! It’s such a fantastic sports car.
